attachments.fallback:
patch 8.1.0211: expanding a file name "~" results in $HOME

Problem:    Expanding a file name "~" results in $HOME. (Aidan Shafran)
Solution:   Change "~" to "./~" before expanding. (closes #3072)
attachments.title: patch 8.1.0211: expanding a file name "" results in $HOME
attachments.text:
patch 8.1.0211: expanding a file name "~" results in $HOME

Problem:    Expanding a file name "~" results in $HOME. (Aidan Shafran)
Solution:   Change "~" to "./~" before expanding. (closes #3072)

attachments.fallback:
patch 8.1.0212: preferred cursor column not set in interfaces

Problem:    Preferred cursor column not set in interfaces.
Solution:   Set w_set_curswant when setting the cursor. (David Hotham,
            closes #3060)
attachments.title: patch 8.1.0212: preferred cursor column not set in interfaces
attachments.text:

            closes #3060)

attachments.fallback:
patch 8.1.0213: CTRL-W CR does not work properly in a quickfix window

Problem:    CTRL-W CR does not work properly in a quickfix window.
Solution:   Split the window if needed. (Jason Franklin)
attachments.title: patch 8.1.0213: CTRL-W CR does not work properly in a quickfix window
